mobile_skills.mobile_skills_text: I specialize in web-development, passionate about useful and usefriednly UI interfaces, responsible for my work and trying to impress customers with my products

more_about_block.more_about_me: Hey, I'm Alex! I'm a fullstack-developer. My coding journey started from C++, I know that this language is not a peace of cake as first programming language, but hours of practicing payed off: with C++ knowledge I learning Python, TypeScript, JavaScript easier cause I underestood basic concepts of low-level programming languages. Nowadays I'm improving my JS (TypeScript), CSS skills and trying new libraries (ReactJS). Frontend development isn't my last point in programming career. Next step is Swift.
